text: ane te samaya pana yada karava jevo che ke jyare ke allaha ta'ala kahese ke he marayamana putra isa! Sum tame te lokone kahi didhum hatum ke mane ane mari matane pana allaha ta'ala sivaya pujya banavi lo, isa kahese ke hum to tane pavitra samajum chum, mara mate avi vata karavi asakya hati, jeno ko'i adhikara mane na hato, jo mem kahyum hase to tane a viseni jana hase, tum to mara hrdayani vatone pana jane che ane hum tara hrdayamam je kami che tene nathi janato, badhum ja adrsyane janavavalo tum ja che
